#summary The application used for previewing DyKnow files.

= Introduction =

This application is currently under development.  The hope it to allow the contents of a file generate from DyKnow to be properly read and understood.


= Details =

  * Reads in the contents of a DyKnow file
  * Is able to render each panel individually
  * Able to save an image version of the ink strokes encoded in the panel.
  * Thumbnail equivalents are able to be generated
  * Much of the functionality of this program will be transfered back into a generic library once it is completed.
